Title: Time pressure in software engineering: A systematic review
Inclusion / Exclusion criteria:
Inclusion criteria:

- IC1: The main focus is time pressure in software engineering.
- IC2: The paper presents empirical evidence of time pressure in software engineering.

Exclusion criteria:

- EC1: The paper was written in language other than English.
- EC2: Not a scientific source.
- EC3: The task studied is not a software development task
Prompt instruction: The paper is included, if any inclusion criteria match. If the paper matches any exclusion criteria, it is excluded.
